comments.comments_text: Trent Alexander-Arnold (Liverpool) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.

comments.comments_text: Jordan Henderson fires in a promising shot which ricochets off the goalkeeper back to Divock Origi (Liverpool) inside the box and he sends the ball into the back of the net. The score is 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Andrew Robertson (Liverpool) brings down the pass, looks up and shoots from distance, but it's straight at a defender who unwittingly blocks it. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Liverpool will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: Today's referee Cuneyt Cakir rightly decides to book Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) for his harsh tackle.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Trent Alexander-Arnold plays a pass to the feet of Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool), and he shoots into the back of the net from inside the box. It's 2:0.

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Georginio Wijnaldum (Liverpool) makes it 3:0. He jumped highest to connect with a perfect cross from Xherdan Shaqiri and planted his close-range header into the left side of the goal. Marc-Andre ter Stegen was helpless.

comments.comments_text: That will be all from Philippe Coutinho who is being replaced by the fresh legs of Nelson Semedo (Barcelona).
